title: VLC 3.0.19 Improves AV1 HDR Support with Software Decoding, Fixes Linux Issues
description:
VLC 3.0.19 open-source media player is now available for download with improved AV1 HDR support, Super Resolution scaling with NVIDIA and Intel GPUs, and numerous other improvements and bug fixes.

The post VLC 3.0.19 Improves AV1 HDR Support with Software Decoding, Fixes Linux Issues appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Debian 12.2 “Bookworm” Released with 117 Bug Fixes and 52 Security Updates
description:
Debian GNU/Linux 12.2 is now available for download as the second point release in the Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm” series adding 117 miscellaneous bug fixes and 52 security updates.

The post Debian 12.2 “Bookworm” Released with 117 Bug Fixes and 52 Security Updates appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
